name: QR Code Scanner
description: Feature:  - Decode most QR codes, barcodes and data matrix types.  - Only need to grant camera permissions.  - Provide appropriate actions based on the type of code, such as connecting to Wi-Fi or browsing the website.  - Supports click selection, zoom in/out and flashlight to provide greater accuracy.  - Can use full functionality without internet connection.  - Fast, simple, accurate, safe and free.   Reads the following formats:  1D: EAN-13, EAN-8, UPC-A, UPC-E, Code-39, Code-93, Code-128, ITF, Codabar 2D: QR Code, Data Matrix, PDF-417, AZTEC
